subject: Parcel not received yet
description_text:
Hi There,

My parcel isn't arrived yet. I've paid for fast delivery but looks like
this isn't going to happen.

Please advise.

Regards
Emil

conversations.body_text: Hi Emil Vichev,    We apologize for any inconvenience caused. Due to recent capacity issues with our logistics provider, there may be delays in delivery. We appreciate your understanding.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047100352273

Hi,

I understand, but I've paid for a fast delivery, which wasn't fast and the
parcel missed my son birthday so I would like a refund of the money I've
paid for fast delivery.

Regards
